name: Casa De Garcia - Centenario Gold - Belicoso
additionalNotes:
Casa De Garcia is a super affordable cigar from the folks at Altadis USA, the same people that bring you Romeo Y Julieta, H. Upmann, Montecristo and many more of your favorites. A tasty smoke that is pretty smooth to boot, perfect for any occasion. Made on the same rolling tables by the same top-notch 
Casa de Garcia cigars offer a medium to a full-bodied strength with a flavorful finish. Each smoke provides a full experience of aged filler tobaccos from the Dominican Republic and Honduras.
